replies.body: I still don't get why it does that.
Well, as you can see from the photo, the upvote button is obviously exhausted from long work hours without a break or insurance. Too bad there are no upvote button unions.

#\#upvotebuttonsmatter

Also, I paradoxly got the bug while trying to upvote this post of yours.
Unless it's team recruitment, just keep clicking and it will eventually let you upvote

Don't worry, I already know that.
The only things I downvote are posts that don't facilitate good discussion, and Jhin posts that are at 5 votes.

> [{quoted}](name=EvanThomas,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WkbPGVoT,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-10T23:49:45.644+0000)
>
> and Jhin posts that are at 5 votes.

https://i.imgflip.com/1n1462.jpg
Why not to upvote them to 44?
Not enough smurfs. They need time to breed.
So Gargamel's plan was to upvote posts
TFW you realize there were 100 male Smurfs and only one Smurfette.

And Developer Corner posts!

I remember I was trying to upvote a Dev Corner post and it kept telling me I was not authorized to do so.
Can't tell you how many times I get this message and I'm like bullshit, click again. Bullshit, click again. Bullshit, click again....   Ahh team recruitment, fml!
Upvoted for Jim Carrey. That man is a treasure.
http://thefw.com/files/2013/05/Ace.gif
What a beautiful human being.
they nerfed exhaust though
I only get this message when I'm trying to downvote LMAO!

Holy shit, it just did it when I tried to upvote this.  LMAO

Still upvoted, because fuck the man.  B)
It happened to me 1 board post before this one
It told me I didn't have the necessary account lvl when I tried to upvote this post {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
